languages.text: On killing at least 3 creatures by Weapon AoE attack first time per round, this wielder's attack doesn't count towards the attack limit and doesn't spend MP

traits.locale_text: On killing at least 3 creatures by Weapon AoE attack first time per round, this wielder's attack doesn't count towards the attack limit and doesn't spend MP

languages.text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если персонаж убивает 3 или больше целей атакой оружия {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, эта атака не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon area attack for the first time in a round, that area attack does not spend MP and does not count toward the attack limit per turn.

For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir silah {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısıyla{/g} 3 veya daha fazla hedef öldürürse bu alan saldırısı {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcamaz ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz.
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir silah {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısıyla{/g} 3 veya daha fazla hedef öldürürse bu alan saldırısı {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcamaz ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz.

Giyen kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir silah {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısıyla{/g} 3 veya daha fazla hedef öldürürse bu alan saldırısı HP harcamaz ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz.

languages.text: La primera vez que el portador mate a 3 objetivos o más en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} usando el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} de un arma, ese ataque de área no consume {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} ni cuenta para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La primera vez que el portador mate a 3 objetivos o más en un mismo asalto usando el ataque de área de un arma, ese ataque de área no consume PM ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno.

languages.text: 当装备者在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次通过范围攻击击杀至少3名目标时，此次{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且不计入该{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}回合的攻击上限{/g}。
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者在一轮中首次通过范围攻击击杀至少3名目标时，此次范围攻击不消耗移动点数，且不计入该回合的攻击上限。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} 3 oder mehr Ziele mit einem Waffen-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} tötet, verbraucht dieser Flächenangriff keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und wird nicht für das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} gewertet.
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer Runde 3 oder mehr Ziele mit einem Waffen-Flächenangriff tötet, verbraucht dieser Flächenangriff keine BP und wird nicht für das Angriffslimit pro Zug gewertet.

languages.text: Pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, si le porteur tue 3 cibles ou plus à l'aide d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} exécutée avec une arme, cette attaque de zone ne dépense pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pour la première fois au cours d'un round, si le porteur tue 3 cibles ou plus à l'aide d'une attaque de zone exécutée avec une arme, cette attaque de zone ne dépense pas de PD et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めて、使用者が武器の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}で3体以上のターゲットを倒した場合、その範囲攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費せず、ターンごとの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}にカウントされない。
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ラウンドで初めて、使用者が武器の範囲攻撃で3体以上のターゲットを倒した場合、その範囲攻撃はMPを消費せず、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされない。
ラウンドで初めて、使用者が武器の範囲攻撃で3体以上のターゲットを倒した場合、その範囲攻撃はMPを消費せず、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされない。

languages.text: Если персонаж убивает 3 или больше целей атакой оружия {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, эта атака не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}.
languages.original_text: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж убивает 3 или больше целей атакой оружия по области впервые за раунд, эта атака не тратит ОП и не входит в лимит атак на ход.
Если персонаж убивает 3 или больше целей атакой оружия по области впервые за раунд, эта атака не тратит ОП и не входит в лимит атак на ход.
